attributes.action: enforce laws pertaining to the practice of archery by boys and men from 12 years and older,for 2 hours on a sunday,supervised by clergy.also to repeal the ban on bowhunting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
and if we dont get our demands met we the people of the westcountry will:
1)  howl at the full moon.
2)  bite the heads off dandilions on st georges day.
3) buy the worlds supply of rough scrumpy.
4)  in form vladimir putin where you buy your fish and chips from.
